overview: Artist's Curse, for the poet and artist, in any form to be cursed with having to swallow the eyes of a faceless woman moon-eyed woman, whose contact with his stargaze creates a timeless eclipse. The lovely bonsai and Zahir which will grow through the artist's cursed memory, and forever he'll be doomed to love the same woman. Lover's Blessing, the muse's blessing to live forever through the poet's creations.
tagline: Fui sol, ahora solo arena en la marea
title: Artist's Curse, Lover's Blessing
